Source.Name: mtpfs
Source.Summary: MTPFS is a FUSE filesystem based on libmtp that allows a mtp device to be browsed as if it were a normal external harddisk.
Source.Description: MTPFS is a FUSE filesystem based on libmtp that allows a mtp device to be browsed as if it were a normal external harddisk.
